Class HelperMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • otherClasses.HelperMethods

  • public class HelperMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Project #5 CS 2334, Section 010 April 24, 2015 Methods to help the the other classes. Also contains stuff for degrees of separation

    • Method Detail

      • getDegrees

        public boolean getDegrees(Person start,
                          Person end,
                          Person current)
        A method for getting the shortest degrees of separation paths between two people
        Parameters:
        start - The person to start from
        end - The destination person
        current - The intermediate person currently being checked
        Returns:
        whether or not a new shortest degrees of freedom path was found.

      • convertCSVToStringList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> convertCSVToStringList(java.lang.String fileName)
                                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Method for converting a CSV file to a list of String objects in the form "Name, birthDate, birthCity, birthState" or "Name, birthDate, birthCity, birthState"
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the CSV file to grab text from
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of the Strings, each of which was a line of the CSV file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an exception
        java.io.IOException - due to use of BufferedReader
